channel.title: FREE DAGGERFALL! 15 year anniversary of the elder scrolls
channel.description: I already have this, but was amazed that this happened... I'm sure there will be more players now for the greatest video game ever :D It's released to celebrate the 15 year anniversary of the elder scrolls http://bethblog.com/index.php/2009/07/09/daggerfall-now-available-for-free/ EDIT: Another reason why it's so amazing is that the Daggerfall community was pretty certain Bethesda wouldn't do this since DF using some 3rd party addons, and for years they have been denying that they would.

item.title: FREE DAGGERFALL! 15 year anniversary of the elder scrolls

item.title: FREE DAGGERFALL! 15 year anniversary of the elder scrolls
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I already have this, but was amazed that this happened… I’m sure there will be more players now for the greatest video game ever
It’s released to celebrate the 15 year anniversary of the elder scrolls
http://bethblog.com/index.php/2009/07/09/daggerfall-now-available-for-free/
EDIT:
Another reason why it’s so amazing is that the Daggerfall community was pretty certain Bethesda wouldn’t do this since DF using some 3rd party addons, and for years they have been denying that they would.

Read full topic
